channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The best shows to watch on HBO Max from 2025
item.description: With all the drama surrounding Warner Bros. Discovery's plans to sell itself to another company, it's not currently clear how much longer HBO Max will continue to exist in its current form. But for the time being, the streamer is chock full of solid series you might want to consider watching if you find yourself […]

item.title: Ouvrir sa Tesla avec un iPhone sans batterie : cela serait pour bientôt
item.description: Pendant que Rivian déploie le support officiel d'Apple Car Key, Tesla faisait de la résistance avec son système propriétaire. Le code de l'application mobile vend la mèche : le support arrive. Et c'est une excellente nouvelle pour votre iPhone.

item.title: Samsung plans to integrate Google Photos into its TVs
item.description: Samsung has announced that it "aims to be the first" to natively integrate Google Photos into TVs. The aim is for Google Photos to work seamlessly with Vision AI Companion, Samsung's souped-up version of Bixby. This would help to make user photos part of the day-to-day TV experience, with photos appearing while navigating the TV's OS during "contextual and convenient moments." The company says users will be able to explore their Google Photos libraries in three new experiences. The first is called Memories, and will show curated stories based on "people, locations and meaningful moments." This...

item.title: Xiaomi’s 17 Ultra Leica edition has a rotatable camera zoom
item.description: Xiaomi used the Christmas period to launch its top flagship phone for the year, the 17 Ultra. It drops the extra rear display that's the key selling point of the 17 Pro, but instead adds in the option of a manual zoom ring, built directly into the phone's camera island. That rotating zoom is only […]

item.title: En 2026, ces écrans gaming Samsung et HKC vont enfin dépasser les 1000 Hz, mais pour quoi faire ?
item.description: Samsung et HKC ont dévoilé deux écrans à plus de 1 000 Hz qui seront officiellement présentés au CES 2026 de Las Vegas. Si la barrière brisée est symbolique, elle n'indique cependant pas une tendance de fond pour les écrans de jeu sur PC.

item.title: Samsung dévoile sa gamme audio 2026 : des enceintes « œuvres d’art » et des barres de son optimisées par l’IA
item.description: En amont du CES de Las Vegas, Samsung présente ses nouveautés audio pour l'année 2026. Le constructeur coréen mise cette année sur une collaboration esthétique avec le designer Erwan Bouroullec et renouvelle son haut de gamme cinéma.

item.title: Le Google Pixel 8 s’offre une fonction photo venue du Pixel 9
item.description: Google met à jour l'application Caméra du Google Pixel 8 pour y introduire une fonctionnalité autrefois réservée au Pixel 9 et 10.

item.title: EDF Tempo : prix du kWh, jours rouges et rentabilité
item.description: Toutes les solutions sont bonnes à prendre pour réduire sa facture efficacement. L'une d'entre elles, chez EDF, s'appelle Tempo. Voici comment ça fonctionne.

item.title: How to watch the Sony Afeela CES 2026 press conference
item.description: Longtime CES observers know that Sony's press conference is the traditional capper to the press day that precedes the show floor's official opening the following day. And while that appears to be the same for 2026, there's a twist: Instead of an overview of Sony's electronics, video game and Hollywood studio plans for the new year, the presser will apparently have a more narrow focus: electric vehicles. Apparently the full event will be focused on two vehicles from Sony Honda Mobility — the Afeela 1 car that has made repeat appearances at CES, as well as an all-new concept model at the event....

item.title: iMP Tech Mini Arcade Pro Review: A Nintendo Switch Arcade Cabinet
item.description: A fun diversion for retro gaming on the Nintendo Switch 2—if you can stand to look at it.

item.title: Windows on Arm had another good year
item.description: In 2024, Qualcomm's Snapdragon X chips finally made Arm-based Windows laptops viable. Unlike previous Arm laptops that struggled to even run Windows well, this new class offered solid performance and the best battery life on Windows, and they impressed us in Microsoft's own Surface Laptop and Surface Pro offerings. But inconsistent app compatibility remained the […]...

item.title: I’m The Verge’s Senior Internet Typist, ask me anything while Nilay’s away!
item.description: Hello from the dead week of the year, when all sane people have logged off to spend time with their families. This is when I typically write at least one deeply weird post while I'm working over the holiday. One time I got left alone on New Year's Day and posted about cats all day […]

item.title: Top cybersecurity habits to take into 2026
item.description: New Year's resolutions... with a twist!

item.title: Make 2026 the year your kid gets off their device
item.description: 4 strategies for resetting their relationship with time-sucking tech.

item.title: Test du Dyson PencilVac Fluffycones : autonomie juste, bac minuscule… et pourtant je ne veux plus le rendre
item.description: Si vous vivez dans une maison de campagne avec de la moquette épaisse et un Maine Coon, arrêtez tout de suite de lire ce test : ce produit n'est pas pour vous. Le PencilVac est l'aspirateur le plus clivant jamais sorti par Dyson.

item.title: These five ingenious materials from 2025 could make buildings greener
item.description: ‘Climate-adaptive’ paint and ‘Superwood’: These material inventions have huge potential to make our built environment more sustainable. Construction materials are responsible for nearly one-third of global carbon dioxide emissions. And as global demand for construction continues to rise (it has already tripled over the past 25 years), its emissions are bound to climb even higher.eIn fact, some, like environmental engineer and University of Virginia professor Andres Clarens, see materials’ potential negative impact as so existential that he calls them the “last major frontier” in the fight agai...

item.title: iPhone Fold : une vidéo dévoile le design, le prix et la fin de Face ID
item.description: Jon Prosser a encore frappé. Le leaker controversé nous sert une nouvelle vision de l'iPhone Fold attendu pour début 2026. Selon le leaker, on aurait droit à un châssis ultra-fin de 4,5 mm et un retour inattendu de Touch ID. Si les caractéristiques font rêver, le prix annoncé risque de calmer tout le monde.

item.title: La version Switch 2 de Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade est en préco à son meilleur prix avec un petit bonus
item.description: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade sortira le 22 janvier 2026 sur Switch 2 et Amazon vous le propose à 44,99 euros au lieu de 49,99 euros avec, en cadeau, un booster Magic: The Gathering - Final Fantasy.

item.title: Watch out, Sonos — Samsung's new wireless speakers look very cool, and directly challenge the Era models
item.description: Two new speakers with minimalist designs, and driver setups that directly target Sonos' main home speakers

item.title: Why 2026 will be the year companies finally start to take worker well-being seriously
item.description: This isn’t wishful thinking. It’s grounded in hard, bottom-line realities. Throughout 2025, we’ve watched companies treat employees with a stunning disregard: rolling layoffs (with thousands let go at a time), unchecked workloads, turning a blind eye to burnout—with 76% of U.S. workers reporting at least one health condition today—and a near-gleeful rush to replace people with AI....

item.title: Le chinois BYD détrône Tesla et devient le roi de la voiture électrique en 2025
item.description: En 2025, le géant chinois BYD a officiellement volé la vedette à Tesla. Elon Musk perd sa couronne mondiale face à une offensive asiatique inarrêtable.

item.title: The Best Vacuum for Pet Hair—We Tested Many to Find Which Ones Work Best (2026)
item.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

item.title: The Worst Hacks of 2025
item.description: From university breaches to cyberattacks that shut down whole supply chains, these were the worst cybersecurity incidents of the year.

item.title: The Best Body Pillow, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From the classic body pillow to unique shapes for optimal limb support, we tested a wide range of body pillows designed for side sleepers.

item.title: I write for a living and this is the only Mac and iOS app I’ll use in 2026
item.description: Ulysses is a powerhouse for professional writing –and it's pretty great for casual writing and storing ideas too.

item.title: Building a business in 2026? Launch your website for less with this huge Hostinger discount - exclusive to TechRadar
item.description: If you want to start your own business in 2026, this exclusive Hostinger discount is one to take advantage of.

item.title: Brighter OLEDs, better viewing angles and cheaper prices – here's what I want to see from LG, Samsung and every other major TV brand in 2026
item.description: Every TV brand had a great year in 2025, but there's always room for improvement. So, I put together a wishlist for 2026.

item.title: Why Revathi Advaithi of Flex is Modern CEO of the Year
item.description: Advaithi continued to reinvent the manufacturing giant for the AI era while undergoing treatment for breast cancer. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: The economy of self—the value of viewing yourself as a personal economic ecosystem
item.description: A new framework for stability in 2026 after an unstable 2025. Every December, millions of people pause to take stock of their lives before the new year. Some gather for vision-board parties, others sketch out New Year’s resolutions, and many quietly vow to “finally get organized” before the clock hits midnight. But this year feels different.

item.title: Google Photos is coming to Samsung TVs in 2026
item.description: Google Photos will finally be available on TVs next year, starting with an upcoming integration for Samsung TVs. Samsung announced that the planned integration will "seamlessly bring the photos people capture on their phones to Samsung TVs, where they can appear in a larger, cinematic format," and that it wants Google Photos to be "deeply […]

item.title: Les jeux PS4 gratuits sur Playstation Plus, c’est bientôt terminé
item.description: Mauvaise nouvelle pour les derniers joueurs sur PS4 et pour les abonnés à la formule de base du Playstation Plus. Les titres PS4 gratuits vont disparaître du catalogue.
